author: susantha
msg: Resolved the problem of compiling and running on Linux/Free BSD etc.
1. Axis code base reverted back to using char instead of wchar_t
2. Introduced WSDDKeywords class to hold transcoded (to 16 bit chars) keywords.
3. Reduced use of STL strings in some places.
4. WCG reverted back to use wrappers that uses char instead of wchar_t.
5. Removed few unnecessary files IAccessBean.h, AccessBean.h, AccessBean.cpp

author: susantha
msg: Updated the Visual C++ project files.
Also removed all .plg files which are not necessary

author: damitha
msg: log:To trace debugging messages we have a class called Debug. As this is name is not appropriate
to use I changed it to AxisTrace. So I modified the above files appropriately.

author: susantha
msg: Updated wrapper class generator according to the new wrapper class generation rules.
Also did some changes in the code base to support these new wrapper classes
